item.title: After All We Can Do
item.description:
After All We Can Do by Elder Claudio D. Zivic, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 177th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 2007
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Claudio D. Zivic, Of the Seventy

item.description:

item.title: He That Shall Endure unto the End, the Same Shall Be Saved
item.description:
